xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/688008-Buffy Sainte-Marie: A Multimedia Life 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3TaQ4TXBzQ5khbQHg70LGuVFfJS.jpg Buffy Sainte-Marie is best known for her protest songs (Universal Soldier) and her love songs (Up Where We Belong). This one-hour documentary chronicles her remarkable career as she rises to prominence in the 1960s Greenwich Village folk music scene and blazes a groundbreaking path as an Aboriginal-rights advocate, digital artist and Oscar-winning songwriter. Buffy Sainte-Marie: A Multimedia Life
